name: Citrus Basil Handmade Soap
description:
A crisp, clean fragrance with a hint of basil leaves rounds out this citrusy summer soap.

Citrus Basil was made with our House Blend oils (our exclusive blend of tallow, olive oil, coconut oil, castor oil, and cocoa butter), plus premium fragrance oil, oatmeal, kaolin clay, and micas/oxides (colour)

{{ FAQs }}}

----How well do our soaps work?
All of our soaps are formulated to clean the dirtiest skin (think hard working guy who’s spent all day in the sun, caked in dirt and grease) while being gentle enough for the most sensitive skin. Our soap is fantastic for all skin types.

It’s a careful balance a soap maker has to work with – by denfinition, soap is meant to remove all dirt and oil from the skin; but too much cleansing causes dry skin.

We’ve created our exclusive oil blends to clean your skin without overdrying, leaving it clean and soft. We hate that itchy, tight feeling as much as you do!

----How strong are your scents?
Our philosophy is that scented soap itself should smell pleasant during use, but not be strong enough to leave a strong scent on the skin or scent a large room. We believe it’s a waste of our money and yours to use so much essential or fragrance oil in a wash off product that it leaves a strong scent on the skin. We believe it’s better to scent the skin with leave on products, like perfume or lotions.

name: Fresh Mint Handmade Soap
description:

Fresh Mint was made with our House Blend oils (our exclusive blend of tallow, olive oil, coconut oil, castor oil, and cocoa butter), plus Spearmint Essential Oil, Peppermint Essential Oil, oatmeal, kaolin clay, and oxides/micas (colour)

name: Sweet Orange Chili Pepper Handmade Soap
description:
Sweet, fresh oranges with a hint of zesty spice, with a fun white and orange swirl.

Sweet Orange Chili Pepper was made with our House Blend oils (our exclusive blend of tallow, olive oil, coconut oil, castor oil, and cocoa butter), plus premium fragrance oil, sodium lactate, oatmeal, kaolin clay, and oxides/micas (colour)

name: Pink Sugar Handmade Soap
description:
A delightfully feminine fragrance with the sweetness of sugar, cotton candy, vanilla, musk and light florals.

------------------------------------------------------------

Pink Sugar was made with our House Blend oils (our exclusive blend of tallow, olive oil, coconut oil, castor oil, and cocoa butter), plus oatmeal, kaolin clay, and premium fragrance oil

name: Sweet Juicy Fruit Handmade Soap
description:
A citrus fragrance abundant with fresh oranges, grapefruit, strawberries, ripe melon, peaches and kiwi…..sprinkled with a touch of sugar.

Sweet Juicy Fruit was made with our House Blend oils (our exclusive blend of tallow, olive oil, coconut oil, castor oil, and cocoa butter), plus premium fragrance oil, oatmeal, kaolin clay, and cosmetic safe colour (Mica, Titanium Dioxide, Tin Oxide, Iron Oxide)
